name: Silver Millenium
startIntroPart1: Neo-Queen Serenity would almost never leave the Crystal Palace but one day in a panic she left suddenly. Then a huge explosion occurred and everything was blown away in an instant except for the Crystal Palace, which was made from the Silver Crystal. Afterwards there was a grave silence at that very moment the Queens body was instantly engulfed in crystal as if she was being protected. However the four Senshi, Sailor Mars, Sailor Venus, Sailor Mercury and Sailor Jupiter along with King Endymion who were at her side, took a direct hit and fell. Chibiusa and Diana were the only ones who were spared.
startIntroPart2: Oh, Neo-Queen Serenity... Take your scepter and show them the real power of the Legendary Silver Crystal... Or Will you stay frozen in a crystal and watch as your empire shattered like a broken glass... Will you stand the test of time.
declaringWar: An error doesn't become a mistake unless you refuse to change it.
attacked: True power isn't something you can take. You have to create it and when you create it, it's never alone - you always need others.
defeated: Love isn't something you take, it's something you gain... Farewell.
introduction: Welcome... I'm Neo-Queen Serenity, The Queen of The Moon People and Silver Millenium. As a wise ruler, I suggest may tranquility and harmony connect both our nations.
neutralLetsHearIt: Is there anything we can help you with?
Is there anything we can offer you?
hateLetsHearIt: Is there anything we can help you?
afterPeace: We all have a star in our heart. I believe that star of yours has shine brighter and called upon you to stop this war.
tradeRequest: We who were born from the Moon, who has a long lifespan, here have an Offer to make of you.
uniques: [+50]% City Strength from defensive buildings <when at war>
May buy [Sailor Guardian] units for [50] [Gold] [in capital]
